meanings.definition: To log out of a computer system or online account.
meanings.sent1: Please logout before closing the browser.
meanings.sent2: Remember to logout of your email to keep it secure.
meanings.sent3: After finishing your work, don't forget to logout like a digital goodbye.
meanings.sent4: She decided to logout from the virtual world and return to reality.
meanings.sent5: The logout button is like a virtual door closing behind you.

meanings.sent1: The logout was successful without any issues.
meanings.sent2: I always click on the logout button to end my session.
meanings.sent3: The logout screen popped up, signaling the end of the online session.
meanings.sent4: The logout felt like a small victory after a long online meeting.
meanings.sent5: The logout process was quick and easy to complete.
